name: Interferance dungeon
description:
--- Made in 2 hours and 40min ---

This is a small game with 1 level. The goal is to make an interference in the blue signal with your own blue signal.

You can move around with the directional crosses and activate the signal by pressing space (keep pressing as long as you want to keep the signal active).

The web version is unfortunately not available, the game being developed on a beta of godot wich not supporting web export, something I noticed only at the end.

The experience is not great but I'm quite proud for a first "playable" game that I made entirely by myself (I also made the textures, but I think you can see that :/ )

I hope you enjoyed this game, and I'm looking forward to discovering the other games of this game jam.

Programmably,

Archetlephant
